channel.title: MachineLearning on Modeling of Everything
channel.description: Recent content in MachineLearning on Modeling of Everything

item.title: Using random forest to predict bandgaps and HOMOs
item.description: A new idea that whether we can bypass quantum chemistry calculation using proper machine learning method is very popular now. It will be very interesting if we could have a second way to resolve material discovery objective rather than using Density functional theory (DFT) that is the major method in every material discovery projects. Here I will just primarily compare predictions from DFT and a popular machine learning method called random forest.

item.title: Kick start docker for a deeplearning environment
item.description: 1. what is docker The first virtualization machine I setup was back to VMWare era. At that time, by using VMWare, you can install linux on a windows machine, and it is very useful too. For me at that time, knowing nothing about linux, I have to google everything, “how to start X window”, “how to restart service”, “how to install software”. So running the linux in an application-like manner, I can convienetly switch back to browser to search online.
